Document.TEXT: From: News of Temperature & Moisture Sensors & Their Uses NEW Five Year Contract Helsinki, Finland — Vaisala has signed a multi-year contract with the U.S. Federal Aviation Administration (FAA) to deliver eighty (80) Runway Visual Range (RVR) systems and sub-systems. These systems are being procured to replace aging RVR … Continue reading → The article US FAA Chooses Vaisala for Runway Visual Range Systems appeared first on News of Temperature & Moisture Sensors & Their Uses.
